name: Minimal Annihilation
description:
Minimal Annihilation is a minimaslistic RTS, the gameplay, the graphics, event the dimensions are at a minimum.

All the actions can be done with the mouse. Select units, collect minerals, build a barracks and start training units to terminate the enemy. It comes with 4 difficulty levels (not very tested, start with easy)

The inspiration has come from many places: 8 bits games like army moves, game over, moon patrol, ... RTSs like Command and Conquer, Dune and Starcraft of course.

It has been developed using flash for the code, Paint Shop Pro for the gfx and Autoracker+Sfxr for the music&effects.

A lot of effort has been put into the game, I hope you enjoy it.

#42 best game in Ludum dare 26 and #32 funniest game
